SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.controllers

Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.controllers.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
Handles requests related to BTO project applications, acting as an intermediary between the user interface (views) and the application logic (ApplicationService). Future implementation of input validation can be handled here.

  • Field Details

    • applicationService

      private ApplicationService applicationService
      The service layer handling core application logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationController

      public ApplicationController()
      Default constructor for ApplicationController. Note: The ApplicationService is not initialized here. Use the constructor with AppContext or set the service manually if using this constructor.

    • ApplicationController

      public ApplicationController(AppContext appContext)
      Constructs an ApplicationController, initializing the ApplicationService using the provided AppCntext.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The shared application context containing currentUser, repositories and services.

    • ApplicationController

      public ApplicationController(ApplicationService applicationService)
      Constructs an ApplicationController with a pre-existing ApplicationService instance. Useful for testing or specific dependency injection scenarios.
      Parameters:
      applicationService - The ApplicationService instance to use.

  • Method Details

    • viewAvailableProjectsForApplicant

      public void viewAvailableProjectsForApplicant()
      Uses getAvailableProjectsForApplicant() to print, just a depriciated method. Delegates the calling getAvailableProjectsForApplicant() logic to the ApplicationService.

    • getAvailableProjectsForApplicant

      public List<BTOProjectModel> getAvailableProjectsForApplicant()
      Retrieves a list of BTO projects that the current applicant is eligible to apply for. Delegates the logic to the ApplicationService.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOProjectModel instances representing the available projects for the applicant.

    • applyToProject

      public Boolean applyToProject(ProjectRepo projectRepo, Scanner scanner, UserModel currentUser)
      Handles the process for a user to submit an application for a specific BTO project. Delegates the application logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      projectRepo - Repository to access project data.
      scanner - Scanner instance for capturing user input (e.g., flat type choice).
      currentUser - The user model representing the applicant.
      Returns:
      True if the application submission was successful, false otherwise.

    • viewApplicationStatus

      public ApplicationStatus viewApplicationStatus(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Retrieves the current status of a specific BTO application.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance to check.
      Returns:
      The ApplicationStatus enum value representing the application's current state.

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public void updateApplicationStatus(BTOApplicationModel application, ApplicationStatus status)
      Updates the status of a given BTO application.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance to update.
      status - The new ApplicationStatus to set.

    • approveApplication

      public void approveApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Sets the status of a given BTO application to SUCCESSFUL. Note: This is a simple status update. Use approveApplicantApplication for logic involving checks and balances.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance to approve.

    • rejectApplication

      public void rejectApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Sets the status of a given BTO application to UNSUCCESSFUL. Note: This is a simple status update. Use rejectApplicantApplication for logic involving checks and balances.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance to reject.

    • generateReceipt

      public Receipt generateReceipt(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Generates a receipt object for a given BTO application.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance for which to generate a receipt.
      Returns:
      A Receipt object containing application details.

    • approveApplicantApplication

      public Boolean approveApplicantApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Handles the logic for approving an applicant's BTO application, including necessary checks (e.g., flat availability). Delegates the core approval logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance to approve.
      Returns:
      True if the application was successfully approved, false otherwise (e.g., no flats left, authorization failure).

    • rejectApplicantApplication

      public Boolean rejectApplicantApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Handles the logic for rejecting an applicant's BTO application. Delegates the core rejection logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance to reject.
      Returns:
      True if the application was successfully rejected, false otherwise (e.g., authorization failure).

    • approveApplicantWithdrawalApplication

      public boolean approveApplicantWithdrawalApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Handles the logic for approving an applicant's request to withdraw their BTO application. This typically involves updating status and potentially adjusting flat counts. Delegates the core withdrawal approval logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance whose withdrawal request is being approved.
      Returns:
      True if the withdrawal was successfully approved, false otherwise (e.g., authorization failure).

    • rejectApplicantWithdrawalApplication

      public boolean rejectApplicantWithdrawalApplication(BTOApplicationModel application)
      Handles the logic for rejecting an applicant's request to withdraw their BTO application. This typically involves resetting the withdrawal request flag. Delegates the core withdrawal rejection logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplicationModel instance whose withdrawal request is being rejected.
      Returns:
      True if the withdrawal rejection was successful, false otherwise (e.g., authorization failure).

    • updateApplicationStatusToBooked

      public boolean updateApplicationStatusToBooked(int applicationID)
      Updates the status of a specific application to BOOKED. Delegates the update logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The unique ID of the application to update.
      Returns:
      True if the status was successfully updated, false otherwise (e.g., application not found).

    • updateApplicationFlatType

      public boolean updateApplicationFlatType(int applicationID, FlatType newFlatType, List<FlatType> availableFlatTypes)
      Updates the chosen flat type for a specific application, ensuring the new type is valid. Delegates the update logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - The unique ID of the application to update.
      newFlatType - The desired new FlatType.
      availableFlatTypes - A list of currently available flat types for validation.
      Returns:
      True if the flat type was successfully updated, false otherwise (e.g., invalid type, application not found).

    • viewApplicationByNRIC

      public boolean viewApplicationByNRIC(int projectID, String nric, BTOApplicationModel[] outputApplication)
      Searches for and retrieves a specific BTO application within a project based on the applicant's NRIC. Delegates the search logic to the ApplicationService.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The ID of the project to search within.
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant whose application is sought.
      outputApplication - An array (expected size 1) to store the found application if successful.
      Returns:
      True if an application matching the criteria was found and placed in outputApplication, false otherwise.
